MainAboutP: I enjoy working on IT projects focused on web development and game development. I also enjoy learning new things in the field of Computer Science.
MainWorkExpI1P: Writing unit and smoke tests for Unreal Engine 5 in C++.
MainWorkExpI2P: Guiding tours of tourists through the Bouzov castle and informing them about the castle's history.
MainWorkExpI3P: Teaching kids about the basics of programming in the Scoolcode environment.
MainWorkExpI4P: Helping as an intern with the common tasks an IT assistant has to deal with on a daily basis.
MainWorkExpI5P: Writing gaming news articles and reviews.
MainEduI1P: Going for a college degree in programming and app development at the Faculty of Informatics.
MainEduI2P: Computer science oriented high school ended with the Maturita exam.
ProjectsI1P: With the help of testers Jouklik and KillerSlovakia and of course Fénix ProDabing, I have worked to get Czech localisation into the amazing mod for Return to Castle Wolfenstein, RealRTCW, which aims to modernize the games graphics and restore some of it's parts, that were almost lost to time.
ProjectsI2P: After quite a lot of time thinking about it, I finally pushed myself to create this webpage. I struggled for a bit figuring out if I should use React, but in the end I settled on Vue + Vite with Bun in the background.
Footer: This page was made by Michael Hrubý with Vue + Vite and Bun
